urls.title: Fish ageing: A powerful tool for fisheries!
urls.description: Have you ever wondered how old your last catch was? Or perhaps how long different species can survive for, given the right conditions? This month, we have a special guest blog post from Environment‚Ä¶

text:
Ever wondered how old your last catch was? Scale samples can tell us an incredible amount about fish, from feeding and migration habits, to the health of fisheries. Our latest blog has some fascinating insight from¬†Conor McCormick @EnvAgency¬†
